full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGA' LDAN DU SKYES PA 'DREN PA'I GSOL 'DEBS SMON LAM NYEN 'BYED 'DREN PA'I SKYA RINGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN BYAMS MGON GYI THUGS RJE BSKUL BA'I GSOL BA 'DEBS DGA' LDAN DU SKYE BA 'DREN PA'I SMON TSIG 'DI YANG, SPRUL MING NGAG DBANG DGE 'DUN GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYI BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,GSOL SMON DE LTAR BYAS PAS 'DI NI BSHI 'PHOS MA THAG ZHING DER SKYE BAS BAG CHAGS 'JOG CING ZHING SKYONG DU YANG 'GRO BA SOGS DGOS PA SHIN TU CHE'O, ,)
